title: Implement Transaction Status page (Sending / Confirmed / Finalised)

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet Send Page MVP
labels.description: all issues for the send page of the wallet

body: # Feature Issue ### User Story As a user, I want to see a the state of my transaction in real time **so that** I can be sure if it the transaction succeeds or not ### Description Figma Design 1: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1082-261340&mode=design&t=aTiN1IeemgbJnFPl-4 Figma Design 2: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1084-261948&mode=design&t=aTiN1IeemgbJnFPl-4 Figma Design 3: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1091-266847&mode=design&t=aTiN1IeemgbJnFPl-4 Figma Design 4: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1091-271993&mode=design&t=aTiN1IeemgbJnFPl-4 Figma Design 5: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1091-272706&mode=design&t=aTiN1IeemgbJnFPl-4 Visual reference: ### Acceptance Criteria - [ ] Show each operation status for each network (`Sending` / `Bridging and sending`) - [ ] If there are transactions pending, show `Sending...` title as in Figma designs 1 and 2. If transactions are confirmed, show `Transactions confirmed!` as in Figma designs 3 and 4. If transactions are finalised on each network (reaches minimum amount of blocks), show `Transaction finalised!` as Figma design 5 - [ ] User can dismiss the screen at any moment by tapping the `Done` button and reopen by tapping in the transaction item within the `Activity` tab in wallet. If `Activity` tab in wallet is not created yet, the reopen part of this item can be implemented in another PR. - [ ] Background gradient should represent the account color - [ ] Light and dark mode should be implemented Feel free to break up this issue in smaller issues if necessary
